body:
Making sure your Xebia CV is up to date is very important. This helps sales and delivery to do their matchmaking magic for your future epic assignment(s). 
The template for your resume can be found here: 
- [ ] Fill out your Xebia CV, [click ](https://xebiagroup.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/XebiaCreativeService/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7B672CECD4-567C-4F5A-9D4F-E3B4D297F876%7D&file=Xebia_CV-Template.potx&wdLOR=c008602C4-6668-416D-8F40-0B9F61530FB5&action=edit&mobileredirect=true)for template. 
- [ ] Upload Xebia CV to [this location](https://xebiagroup.sharepoint.com/sites/xpirit/Gedeelde%20%20documenten/Forms/AllItems.aspx?csf=1&web=1&e=zrLIMa&cid=fd130219%2Dbabc%2D48db%2D80e1%2Df8ad57ad75f8&RootFolder=%2Fsites%2Fxpirit%2FGedeelde%20%20documenten%2FXpirit%20Group%2FPersoneel%20en%20Hiring%2FCV%20medewerkers%2FXebia%20CV&FolderCTID=0x012000FA013B87277D88499EC53EEC1D85F5A1).
- [ ] Send message to Ren√© and Matthias to notify that your CV is ready

Topics that can (or should) be addressed in dialog between Newby and Buddy

**First Date(s)**

body:
# ‚è≥ Now it's time to get started!

## üñäÔ∏è Create your Xebia email signature
Creating your personal Xebia email signature is very easy, follow this link to the signature generator and copy + paste your newly generated signature in your email: https://signature.xebia.com/ 
- [ ] Create your Xebia email signature

## üî® Pimp your Xebia resume
#35 

## üé® Pimp your personal page in Navigator
Based on your Xebia resume, a personal page in the XMS Navigator is generated by AI. It's up to you to pimp this page. Here you can share what your dream assignment looks like etc. 
The personal pages in Navigator can be found here:
- [ ] Pimp your personal page in Navigator
title: ‚è≥ Day 4 - Get started

body:
## üí° Get inspired
Lots of colleagues work on their personal authority mission in various ways. E.g. by speaking at conferences, posting on social media, up-keeping a newsletter, and writing blogs.
Rob Bos is one of those colleagues that regularly sets foot on stages all over the world, makes his fair share of contributions to the GitHub and Microsoft communities, posts on social media, edits a newsletter and writes blogs.
During this session, Rob will share his personal experience in building his personal brand and how to get started with writing blogs.

You can revisit his slides after the session here:
title: ‚úçÔ∏è Day 4 - Writing a blog by Rob

title: :trollface: Day 5 - So close, but even more info

body:
# Personal branding
At Xebia, we live by our authority mission. Today will be all about "personal branding". Where can you start, or continue, building your personal brand and what support and tools can you use within Xebia?

## Your schedule for today
09:00 - 11:30 ‚úçÔ∏è Writing a blog by Rob
11:30 - 12:00 ü•™ Lunch  
12:00 - 13:00 ‚ú® Personal Branding by Kim 
13:00 - 17:00 ‚è≥ Time to get started

## Extra info & track your progress
```[tasklist]

- [ ] https://github.com/XpiritBV/XMS-Onboarding/issues/23
- [ ] https://github.com/XpiritBV/XMS-Onboarding/issues/24
```
title: ‚ú® Day 4 - Personal Branding

body:
# üèÅ Ready, set, go!
Whether you've been a consultant with your previous organization or not, we want to make sure that you are prepped and know everything you need and want to know, before starting your first epic assignment. Today is all about absorbing the Xebia way of consulting. 

## Your schedule for today

09:00 - 11:30 üó£Ô∏è Consultative selling by **Matthias**  
11:30 - 12:00 ü•™ Lunch 
12:00 - 13:00 üî® Create / Update your CV - add info see email
13:00 - 15:00 üí° XMS Signature & Engineering Culture by @renevanosnabrugge  
15:00 - 17:00 üíª Time to do some work / set up your super powers

title: üíº Day 3 - Become Consultant Ready

body:
# üöÄ  Learning, it's a journey
By now, you must have heard about our BHAG: our authority mission. And you probably have thought of your personal authority mission as well. In order to become the best at what we do, we all need to absorb knowledge, so that we can share knowledge. Today you'll kick-start your personal learning journey with the CC0 training and onboarding to Pluralsight.

## Your schedule for today

09:00 - 12:00 üéì Xebia CC0 training for consultants 
12:00 - 12:30 ü•™ Lunch with @alexthissen   
12:30 - 14:30 üìà Pluralsight Onboarding based on the learning paths by @alexthissen  
14:30 - 16:30 üë¨ Buddy time - briefing by @ImmanuelKranendonk 

## Track your progress 

- [ ] #18
- [ ] #20
title: üéì Day 2 - Start of Your Learning Journey

body:
# üéâ Today's the day!
Your first day at Xebia should be a remarkable one. To get into the spirit of becoming a Xebian, you will kick-off this day with an escape room: team up with your new colleagues, get to know our culture and learn your way around the office.
The rest of the program includes some practical information on how we do things at Xebia, lunch of course, and sharing a bit about yourself in a personal vlog. At the end of this first day, you'll have some one on one time with Immanuel and you can pick up your gear with ICT.

## Your schedule for today

09:00 - 11:00 üëüEscape room
11:00 - 12:00 üí∏ HR & finance introduction 
12:00 - 12:30 üçûLunch  
13:00 - 13:30 üîíSecurity Awareness Sessie 
13:00 - 13:30 üéôÔ∏èRecord a vlog in the Xebia Studio  
14:00 - 15:30 üßë‚Äçü¶±Time with Immanuel  / üíªPick up your gear
